archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Comscore Analytics
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
EXTERNALLY HOSTED Generates counter re number of page views - looks at url and changes into a human readable string, links to it country from, IP address. All this content is minable via the comscore website. Embedded script in each page - embedded by Toptail - calls Toptail and sends it information about that page visit in the Comscore required format. We host this .Net script on our Content Delivery Network (CDN). We have 2 CDN;s - one for stylesheets, called 'styles.ac.uk', and one for javascripts, java plugins, jquery etc. - called 'components.ac.uk'
